workflow.name: Automate video creation with Gemini Prompts and Vertex AI to Google Drive
workflow.description:
Automate video creation: AI generates ideas, Vertex AI renders videos, and auto-uploads to Google Drive with complete tracking.

**What You Get**

- Gemini AI for creative prompts
- Vertex AI video generation
- Auto-upload to Google Drive
- Complete Google Sheets logging
- Smart retry logic
- Base64 to MP4 conversion

**Setup**

1. Enable Vertex AI in [Google Cloud](https://console.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/studio/)
2. Get [Gemini API key](https://aistudio.google.com/)
3. Run `gcloud auth print-access-token` for ACCESS TOKEN
4. Import workflow & configure credentials
5. Add prompts & test

**Flow**

Schedule ‚Üí Gemini AI ‚Üí Vertex AI ‚Üí Wait ‚Üí Convert ‚Üí Upload ‚Üí Log

**Resources**

- [Google Sheets Template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1575_YE8kQk92Xj2DTpx4feCYDXu4hZh8CVl57Un2l2k/edit?usp=sharing)

**‚ö†Ô∏è Note:** ACCESS TOKEN expires hourly - refresh using `gcloud auth print-access-token`

---

**üìß LinkedIn:** [linkedin.com/in/yourprofile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/gilbert-onyebuchi/)

**üîó More n8n Products:** [Click here](https://sites.google.com/view/template-n8n/linkedin-post-designer)

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet

parameters.text:
=Generate a complete video production concept for this idea: prompt_here

You MUST respond with ONLY valid JSON in this exact format:
{
  "id": "6-character alphanumeric code",
  "idea": "2-3 sentence detailed video concept description",
  "caption": "engaging social media caption under 150 characters",
  "production": "equipment needed, crew size, estimated time",
  "environment_pro": "location, props, set requirements",
  "final_output": "format, duration, platform specifications"
}

Example:
{
  "id": "Y3T1V8",
  "idea": "A friendly Yeti sits in a snowy mountain cave holding a selfie stick...",
  "caption": "POV: You're a Yeti trying to go viral ‚ùÑÔ∏èüì±",
  "production": "1 camera operator, GoPro + extension pole, 2-3 hours",
  "environment_pro": "Snowy set with cave backdrop, selfie stick, fur costume",
  "final_output": "1080p MP4, 60-90 sec, TikTok/Instagram Reels 9:16"
}

Generate actual content, not the schema definition.

parameters.content: ## 3. Generate video, convert to mp4, store and log
## Change Access Token every hour or auto refreshes token using a Google cloud  service account

## AI-Powered Video Generation Pipeline with Google Drive Storage

## How it works
- **Schedule Trigger** node to start the workflow
- **Basic LLM chain** node works with Google Gemini AI (Can be replaced by Claude AI or OpenAI) to generate ideas using a prompt
- **Code** nodes are used to pass the prompt in a structured output
- **Google Sheet** nodes to log in the results
- **HTTP request** node is used to call **vertex AI ACCESS TOKEN**
- Setting is to edit ACCESS TOKEN (Note: **ACCESS TOKEN** Changes hourly)
- **Wait** node to delay
- Convert to file is used to convert base64 to MP4
- **Google Drive** node is used to store video in the Google Drive folder
- **If** node to check if video is completed, otherwise wait 1 more minute and run again

## Setup
1. Get the Google Sheet template below
2. Set Prompts in Basic LLM chain nodes
3. Setup [**Google Cloud**](https://console.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/studio/) and enable Vertex AI and get **ACCESS TOKEN** - use "gcloud auth print-access-token" in Google Cloud terminal
4. Enable [Google Drive](https://console.cloud.google.com/) in Google Cloud and setup credential
5. Get [Gemini API](https://aistudio.google.com/) and setup credential

## [Get Google Sheet template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1575_YE8kQk92Xj2DTpx4feCYDXu4hZh8CVl57Un2l2k/edit?usp=sharing)

main.node: Append or update row in sheet

user.name: Gilbert Onyebuchi
user.bio: Automation builder dedicated to creating powerful, efficient, and scalable workflow solutions. I transform manual processes into seamless automations that save time, reduce errors, and unlock growth for teams and solo operators alike. With strong experience in n8n. I design systems that handle lead management, data enrichment, outreach, marketing and internal operations. My work focuses on results, reliability, and simplicity so you can achieve more with less effort.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
